items.content_html: A lightweight extension for Chromium-based browsers (Chrome, Edge) that redirects link navigations from any window to a user-defined target window. Redirection is automatic and works across tabs and sites, offering a single-window browsing flow.
items.title: Miro-wq/edge-tab-redirector: A lightweight extension for Chromium-based browsers (Chrome, Edge) that redirects link navigations from any window to a user-defined target window. Redirection is automatic and works across tabs and sites, offering a single-window browsing flow.

items.content_html: ⚡ JavaScript-aware crawler for security researchers and bug bounty hunters. Extract hidden endpoints and internal subdomains through static and semantic analysis of JS files. Lightweight. Fast. Sneaky.

items.content_html: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

items.content_html: Zodest is a lightweight framework designed for building scalable web applications with ease. It simplifies the development process by providing intuitive tools and a clear structure, allowing developers to focus on creating high-quality features.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
